page.description: Action Javascript adds functionality to your app by defining behaviors using property sheets. The code required to perform the actions is generated for you. These articles cover a wide variety of Action Javascripts available in the Grid Component..

item.name: [Advanced Export to Excel, Word, HTML, or Ascii using a Report Definition]
item.description: Export data to Excel, Word, HTML or Ascii using a Report Definition.

item.name: [Ajax Callback]
item.description: Define a user-defined ajax callback. The callback can be handled by an Xbasic function that is defined in the component, by a separate .a5w page, or by another page (.e.g., .php, .asp, etc.).

item.name: [City, State Lookup from Zip Code]
item.description: For a given zip code, lookup the city and state on the USPS web site and fill in the city and state in the current record.

item.name: [Export to Excel or Ascii or Custom Format]
item.description: Export data to Excel or Ascii or Custom Format. The Custom format option allows you to define an Xbasic function that creates the file.

item.name: [Fade Out Message]
item.description: The Fade Out Message action displays a message on the screen for a short period of time. The message fades away after a specified duration.

item.name: [File Download]
item.description: Download a file from the server to the user's machine.

item.name: [File Upload]
item.description: Upload a file to the server and store a reference to the file in a Grid field, or embed the file in a Drid field.

item.name: [File Upload - User Defined]
item.description: Upload one or more files to the server. A server-side event then gets called to allow you to process the uploaded files.

item.name: [Geocode an address]
item.description: Makes an Ajax callback to a web service to geocode an address. Fill in the latitude and longitude fields in the current record with the information.

item.name: [Geolocation Functions]
item.description: Get geolocation information from the browser and store information in the current Grid/UX component object (e.g. if you are in a Grid, the data is stored in the {grid.object}.geoLocation object). (Requires an HTML5 browser).

item.name: [Global Search and Replace]
item.description: Search and replace values in a field in all currently visible rows in the Grid.

item.name: [Global Update]
item.description: Set the value in a field in all currently visible rows in the Grid.

item.name: [Google Map Method]
item.description: The Google map method action calls a method to perform some action on a Google Map.

item.name: [Image Upload]
item.description: Upload an image file to the server.

item.name: [Import Data from Excel or Ascii file]
item.description: Upload an Excel or Ascii file and import data into the current Grid or an external table.

item.name: [Inline-Javascript]
item.description: Allows developer to enter javascript code. Unlike most other actions there are no properties to check for the Inline-Javascript action, just the code you want to fire.

item.name: [Lock/unlock a container, DIV or entire page (by showing an overlay over it)]
item.description: Lock a container, DIV or entire page by showing an overlay over it so that the user can't click on the controls under the overlay, or unlock the element.

item.name: [Lookup and Fill-in Fields]
item.description: Lookup values in a table and fill-in fields in the current row from fields in the Lookup Table.

item.name: [Menus]
item.description: Display a dropdown menu.

item.name: [Message box]
item.description: Displays a Javascript alert box on the screen.

item.name: [Open a AppLauncher component]
item.description: Open a AppLauncher component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open a Calendar component]
item.description: Open a Calendar component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open a Custom component]
item.description: Open a Custom component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open a Google Map component]
item.description: Open a Google Map component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open a Grid component]
item.description: Opens a grid component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page. This requires first defining a grid component.

item.name: [Open a Help Window]
item.description: Open a window to display a help topic from the Help Table.

item.name: [Open a ImageGallery component]
item.description: Open a ImageGallery component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open a Page Layout component]
item.description: Open a Page Layout component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open a Pop-up Ajax Window/Overlay]
item.description: Open a generic, pop-up window (often called an overlay). The window can be modal, or modeless, and can be populated by making an Ajax callback.

item.name: [Open a Report, Label or Letter layout]
item.description: Displays a report, label or letter layout as a PDF file using the Acrobat PDF reader. The report is displayed in either a pop-up window or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open a UX as an alternate editing view for current record]
item.description: Open a UX component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page, to edit the record currently being edited in the Grid or UX component.

item.name: [Open a UX component]
item.description: Opens an UX component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page. (Only new Ajax components can be opened. Old dialogs built in V10 and earilier are not supported.

item.name: [Open a UX component to Edit Current Record in Grid, or add a new Record]
item.description: Open an UX component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page, to edit the current row in a Grid component or to enter a new record. (Only new Ajax Components can be opened. Old Dialogs in V10 and earlier are not supported.)

item.name: [Open a Video Player component]
item.description: Open a Video Player component in a pop-up window, or in a DIV on the current page.

item.name: [Open an .a5w page, static HTML page, URL, or PDF document, in a pop-up window or a DIV]
item.description: Open a document (including .a5w pages, static .html pages, any other web page, e.g. www.google.com, or PDF document) in a modal, or modeless pop-up window, or in a DIV on the page.

item.name: [Run Action]
item.description: The Run Action runs an action that was defined using Javascript.

item.name: [Send email]
item.description: This javascript action sends an email.

item.name: [Set Page Content]
item.description: Set the content in one or more page elements (i.e. 'divs', 'spans', form fields, etc.) to values obtained from fields in a Lookup Table.

item.name: [Toggle display of a container or DIV with animation]
item.description: Adds toggle animation to a DIV or container. When the action is run the dive or container will be shown or hidden using a specified animation such as 'slide' or 'puff'.

item.name: [Web-sockets Server Actions]
item.description: Performs an action on the web-socket server, such as 'Send a message to the web-sockets server'. The message will be received by all UX and Grid components that are listening for web-socket messages and the 'webSocketOnMessage client-side event in all listening components will fire.

item.name: [Zip Code Lookup from Address]
item.description: For a given address, lookup the Zip code on the USPS web site and fill in the current record.
